issues.description: Class-name inconsistency for the park class: the UML and task text in the problem statement use the name "ExcellencePark" (and task labels/testClass entries refer to ExcellencePark), but the template and the solution repositories use the class and file name "ExcellenceLand" (ExcellenceLand.java, class ExcellenceLand). This mismatch between the specification and the provided code will confuse students about which class to implement and which class name the tests expect (the task's check function name even references "checkExcellentLandConstructorAndGetters()", indicating inconsistent naming in the tasks).
issues.suggested_fix: Make the park class name consistent across all artifacts. Either (A) rename the class in the template and solution to ExcellencePark (file and class) and update any test/task names to match, or (B) update the problem statement (UML diagram and task descriptions) to use the name ExcellenceLand everywhere (and align the task/test identifiers). Ensure the file name, class name, and all task/test references match exactly.

issues.description: The park entity is referenced with different identifiers across artifacts: the UML and task text in the problem statement call the class 'ExcellencePark' (and refer to it as a UML class), while the template and solution repositories use the class/file name 'ExcellenceLand' (and the problem title also uses the phrase 'Excellence Land'). This mismatch can confuse students about which class to implement or expect in the code and may cause tests or instructions that refer to 'ExcellencePark' to fail to locate the corresponding class.
issues.suggested_fix: Make the park class name consistent across all artifacts. Either (A) rename the class/file in template and solution from 'ExcellenceLand' to 'ExcellencePark' (and update references), or (B) update the problem statement/UML and tasks to use 'ExcellenceLand' (recommended, since the problem title already uses 'Excellence Land'). Ensure all mentions (UML class name, task text, and code) use the same identifier.
